ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 39
ygData.msgSnippet: necro s do get root but at like 34 or 39...somewhere in that range....most casting class s get root early and then just get improved versions as they get
ygData.messageBody:
necro's do get root but at like 34 or 39...somewhere in that range....most
casting class's get root early and then just get improved versions as they
get older.

For some actual info now

Dark Elves have the hardest racial exp gain.
Humans have the easiest racial exp gain.
SK's and Necro's have the hardest exp gains.
Druids make 25% more exp when hunting in an "indoor" zone.

Byzar Bloodforge is the NPC in Kaladim....he is in the left wing of the
warriors guild. You need a really good faction though to get it from him.
If you have been killing crushbone orcs or goblins for your early levels
you should be good. Trumpy...the one you need to kill to get the head is
about level 9....realy easy to kill and the guards standing around him
won't care if you attack him.

C~
